issue.title: Unable to style metadata sheet PDF output
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Unable to style metadata sheet PDF output with CSS:
* The template CSS is not used by mpdf since only the xml2html is passes to pdf processor.

I propose to add a custom CSS field in catalog config (like in dashboard), this way we could:
* Type in custom CSS, or
* link an existing CSS file with an import : @ @import "http://localhost/templates/mytemplate/main.css";@

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.1
